This is the first Kingdom Rush I played that I actually stopped playing and deleted it. Who thought it was a good idea to have levels change up the path halfway through? Or allow people to go other routes of nowhere? I get you're trying to make it different but for me personally this makes the gameplay infuriating and not fun. I worked for 12 level and now everyone can pretty much bypass the defenses? How is that fun???
